title: SEO Specialist - Full Time (Seeking Experienced Professionals in PH or India)
description:
Role Summary:

We are hiring an experienced and highly analytical SEO Specialist (Individual Contributor) who will independently own end-to-end SEO across all three brands: Maker’s Row, 
, and TailoredTeams.



Application Process:

Subject Line: SEO Specialist_[Your Full Name]



Must Include:

A 1–2 minute video introduction and a short explanation of why you’re a great fit for this opportunity. (good spoken English preferred) 

A portfolio Link

Your resume with an active phone number (we will call during EST hours if shortlisted).



This role requires someone who can:

- Develop the strategy

- Execute all technical, on-page, and off-page tasks

- Create SEO-driven content briefs

- Work with engineering/design on implementations

- Track performance

- Build reports, dashboards, and insights

- The candidate must be comfortable being hands-on and execution-heavy, while also thinking long-term and strategically.



Core Purpose: 

To independently drive organic traffic, keyword growth, domain authority, and conversions through a comprehensive SEO strategy executed hands-on by the candidate.



Key Responsibilities:

- Independently plan, execute, and manage SEO roadmap for all three brands.

- Take responsibility for the entire SEO lifecycle; from keyword research to technical audits to backlinking to reporting.

- Build an SEO strategy aligned with each business.

- Set clear SEO KPIs, timelines, content clusters, and traffic goals.

- Identify new organic growth opportunities and present structured plans.

- Perform full-funnel keyword research across multiple ICPs.

- Create keyword clusters, topic maps, pillar-cluster frameworks.

- Execute all on-page SEO activities including metadata and header optimization, schema and alt attribute enhancements, internal linking, and full content optimization aligned with semantic search and E-E-A-T standards.

- Conduct comprehensive technical SEO audits and execute fixes across crawlability, indexation, site speed, Core Web Vitals, redirects, canonicalization, structured data, and overall site architecture by collaborating with engineering for implementation and validation.

- Create SEO-driven content briefs, optimize existing content for ranking and depth, and collaborate with the content team while independently owning the end-to-end SEO direction.

- Execute off-page SEO by running link-building campaigns, securing high-authority backlinks through guest posts and PR opportunities, monitoring DA/DR and link quality, and managing disavow submissions as needed.

- Build and maintain GA4, GSC, and Sheets dashboards while delivering weekly, monthly, and quarterly SEO reports covering all the key metrics along with insights and actionable next steps.



Required Skills & Tools:

Technical Expertise: On-page optimization, Technical SEO audits, Structured data / schema, SEO for SaaS or marketplace sites, Keyword clustering & topic mapping, Backlink strategy, Core Web Vitals improvements, Site architecture & crawl optimization, CMS proficiency (WordPress/Webflow/custom).

Tools: Ahrefs, SEMrush, Screaming Frog / Sitebulb, Google Search Console, GA4, Google Tag Manager, SurferSEO (nice to have), Looker Studio.



Experience Requirements:

- Minimum 5 years of hands-on SEO execution.

- Background in SaaS, marketplaces, job platforms, or B2B service companies preferred.

- Track record of improving organic traffic and rankings significantly.



Important:

IF YOU DO NOT MEET THE MINIMUM 5 YEARS, PLEASE DO NOT APPLY FOR NOW.

We do not check job boards regularly. Please send your complete application to 

to ensure it is reviewed.

title: Notion & SEO reporting Assistant
description:
# Virtual Assistant - SEO & Notion Systems Support



## About the Role



I'm looking for a proactive virtual assistant to help manage daily operations across multiple SEO and web administration client accounts. You'll work directly with me (Simon/Si) to process updates, maintain our Notion workspace, and support client deliverables.



## Daily Responsibilities



### Morning Routine



*
 Management**

- Review and triage incoming
s

- Mark
s I've responded to (track which ones Si has already handled)

- Flag and forward high-priority items to me

- Note important insights and link to relevant
s in our system



**Tool Monitoring & Analysis**

Monitor and action updates from:

- SEO ranking alerts

- Google Search Console (indexation issues, performance changes)

- Google Analytics (anomalies, event tracking concerns)

- Site speed notifications

- Keyword tracking gaps



For each alert, document key insights and recommended actions.



**Notion Task Management**

Review and triage tasks in Notion using our status system (see below)



**Daily Briefing**

- Send me a concise update covering the above

- Highlight anything requiring immediate attention

- Share your planned priorities for the day



### Throughout the Day

- Execute assigned client work

- Update documentation and systems as you work

- Maintain Notion task statuses accurately

- Ask questions freely - clarity is more valuable than guessing



### End-of-Day Routine



**Shutdown Checklist**

- Complete daily shutdown template

- Update tracking spreadsheet with:

  - Tasks completed

  - Time breakdown by activity

  - Key insights or learnings

  - Any blockers or concerns

- Record time with detail (we value insight over just hours logged)



**REQUIRED: Daily Video Update**

- Record and send a brief video summary of your day (2-5 minutes)

- Cover: what you completed, any blockers, and tomorrow's priorities

- This is a non-negotiable daily requirement - clear verbal communication is essential



## Notion Task Status System



You'll be responsible for reviewing and updating task statuses in Notion. Here's how to interpret and assign each status:



**???? Not Started**

- Tasks I haven't reviewed yet

- New items that need initial assessment



**???? Check In Again**

Use this status when:

- You haven't worked on it yet

- There's an upcoming client call related to it

- Tickets that have no actions taken yet

- You're waiting on answers from clients, or me (even if you've already worked on the ticket)

- There are unanswered questions directed at you on a task you've already worked on



**???? Unclear**

Mark tasks as unclear when:

- You're uncertain if the task has been completed or not

- Someone may have actioned it, but it's not obvious

- There are terms or phrases you don't understand, and there's no clear indication it's sorted

- You need clarification before proceeding



**???? Reviewed**

Tasks that are actively being worked on:

- Work is currently in progress

- Someone is actively doing something about it

- The task is moving forward smoothly



**???? Task Completed**

Mark complete when:

- The task is fully sorted

- All questions have been answered

- Calls have notes documented

- Nothing is left hanging



**Recent Tasks Filter**

When filtering for "recent" tasks, use items created or updated within the last 15-30 days (we'll refine this timeframe together).



## Working Principles



**Communication Style**

- **Transparency**: Be open about challenges, mistakes, and progress

- **Solution-oriented**: When raising problems, include your suggested solutions

- **Proactive**: Don't wait for permission to ask questions

- **Cultural note**: Please call me Simon or Si - "Sir" isn't necessary!



**Approach to Work**

- **Take initiative**: If you see something that needs doing, flag it or do it

- **Document as you go**: Keep systems updated in real-time

- **Growth mindset**: We're building this together - mistakes are learning opportunities

- **Trust**: Some work involves sensitive client data - mutual honesty and discretion are essential

- **When in doubt**: Use "Unclear" status and ask - it's better than guessing



**Daily Communication Cadence**

- Morning: Brief goals and priorities

- Throughout day: Questions and quick updates as needed

- Evening: Progress summary and blockers



## What Success Looks Like



- I trust my inbox and tools are monitored without needing to double-check

- Notion workspace is organised with accurate, up-to-date task statuses

- Client work progresses smoothly with minimal back-and-forth

- You spot issues before they become problems

- Our systems and documentation improve over time

- You feel comfortable raising concerns and asking questions

- Nothing falls through the cracks because you flagged unclear items



## Essential Requirements



**Communication Skills (Critical)**

- **Excellent written and spoken English** - You'll be writing daily updates, documenting tasks, and recording video summaries

- **Daily video updates are mandatory** - You must be comfortable recording and sending brief (2-5 minute) video summaries every workday

- Clear, professional communication without needing multiple clarifications



**Technical & Organizational Skills**

- Strong organisational skills and attention to detail

- Experience with Notion or similar project management tools

- Basic understanding of SEO concepts (or willingness to learn quickly)

- Self-directed with strong judgment on prioritisation



**If you're not comfortable with daily video communication or don't have strong English skills, this role isn't the right fit.**



How to Apply

To be considered for this role, please submit:

Work Examples - Share examples of:

Notion workspaces you've built or managed (screenshots or descriptions)

SEO reports you've created or worked on

Any relevant project management or administrative work

Documentation or systems you've developed

Introduction Video (Required) - Record a short video (3-5 minutes) where you:

Introduce yourself

Explain why you're interested in this role

Discuss your relevant experience with the responsibilities listed above

Show me you can communicate clearly on camera

Applications without both work examples and a video will not be considered.

title: Recruiting Operations Specialist (Full-Cycle Hiring + Onboarding) GHL experience required
description:
Recruiting Operations Specialist



(Full-Cycle Hiring + Onboarding + Client Call Booking)

TimeProof Required | GoHighLevel + ATS | Weekly Meetings | SOP Builder



We are a U.S.-based commercial services company building a structured, accountable, and scalable hiring operation. We are hiring a Recruiting Operations Specialist who can run recruiting end-to-end, keep systems clean in GoHighLevel + an ATS, and support our growth through client call booking and coordination.



This is not a VA role.

This is a recruiting + onboarding + operations role with performance expectations and measurable outputs.





What You Will Own



1) Full-Cycle Recruiting

	•	Post and manage job ads across job boards and social platforms

	•	Social recruiting 
 groups, DMs, job boards)

	•	Resume review, screening, and pipeline management

	•	Phone/video interviews with structured notes

	•	Candidate follow-up via SMS/email/calls inside GoHighLevel



2) Onboarding & Training

	•	Run onboarding from start to finish

	•	Explain expectations, rules, and job standards

	•	Ensure new hires are fully ready before activation

	•	Track training completion and readiness inside GHL/ATS



3) Compliance & Documentation

	•	Collect and organize W-9/W-4, IDs, licenses, certifications, and required forms

	•	Maintain audit-ready files and organized records

	•	Ensure no missing steps (clean, complete candidate profiles)



4) Client Outreach + Call Booking (Required)



You will support client growth by:

	•	Making outbound calls to businesses and hiring decision-makers (from provided lists/leads)

	•	Booking qualified client calls/meetings for leadership

	•	Confirming staffing needs, start dates, schedules, and requirements

	•	Documenting all communication inside the CRM



Note: You are responsible for booking and coordinating calls and needs. Leadership handles final deal closing and pricing.



5) SOP Creation + Process Improvement

	•	Create and update SOPs for recruiting, onboarding, training, and tracking

	•	Build checklists, templates, and step-by-step workflows

	•	Improve structure so the operation runs cleanly without chaos



6) Systems Management (Independent Role)

	•	Manage pipelines, tags, tasks, notes, and follow-ups in GoHighLevel

	•	Maintain clean weekly reporting and status updates

	•	Ensure nothing falls through the cracks





Systems Experience (Required)



You must already have experience using:

	•	GoHighLevel (GHL) (pipelines, tags, tasks, notes, forms, workflows)

	•	An ATS or recruiting CRM (CEIPAL, Bullhorn, Tracker, Zoho Recruit, JobAdder, etc.)

	•	Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Calendar)





Required Skills (Non-Negotiable)

	•	Full-cycle recruiting experience (agency or in-house)

	•	Strong interviewing and candidate evaluation skills

	•	Ability to onboard and train new hires

	•	Confident on the phone (candidate + client calls)

	•	Highly organized and process-driven

	•	Able to create SOPs and enforce workflow discipline

	•	Fluent spoken and written English





Meetings + Tracking (Non-Negotiable)

	•	Weekly structured meetings with leadership (plus quick check-ins as needed)

	•	Full-time (40 hours/week)

	•	Daily responsiveness during EST work blocks

	•	TimeProof tracking required (screenshots + activity logs)





Required to Apply (Must Submit All Three)



Applications missing any of these will not be reviewed.



1) Video Introduction (2–4 minutes)



Cover:

	•	Recruiting background + hiring volume

	•	Full-cycle hiring process

	•	Onboarding/training experience

	•	Client calling + call booking experience

	•	GHL + ATS experience

	•	Example SOPs/processes you created



2) Resume



Must show recruiting roles, hiring volume, industries, and responsibilities.



3) Systems List



List the CRMs/ATS/tools you’ve used (GHL, ATS, job boards, dialers, automations).



Compensation



Base: $800 monthly paid weekly on Fridays with milestones

Bonuses

title: Virtual Assistant with experience in content/marketing
description:
Black Sheep Media is a Scotland-based creative agency producing structured short-form brand content and paid ads.



We are hiring a Virtual Assistant to manage editor sourcing and the early stages of our hiring process.



This role is focused on screening, filtering, and managing applications for video editors.



This is a long-term opportunity for someone organised, detail-oriented, and confident making decisions.



Role Overview



You will manage the front end of our editor hiring pipeline.



Your job is to protect the founder’s time by filtering out low-quality applicants and only pushing forward serious, qualified candidates.



Responsibilities



• Source video editors on online jobs ph

• Track applicants in Notion or Google Sheets

• Review portfolios for quality and retention structure

• Screen applications for software requirements and capacity

• Reject unsuitable candidates based on clear criteria

• Send application links and follow up with shortlisted candidates

• Ensure deadlines are met during test stages

• Maintain clear communication with applicants



Requirements



• Strong written English

• Excellent attention to detail

• Highly organised

• Confident making screening decisions

• Comfortable reviewing creative work objectively

• Reliable internet and availability

• Able to work independently without constant supervision



You must be comfortable saying no to applicants who do not meet the standard.



This is not basic admin work. You are helping build the core team of a growing agency.



Ideal Candidate



• Serious about long-term work

• Takes ownership

• Proactive

• Calm under pressure

• Understands quality standards



Employment Structure



• Part-time

• Ongoing role

• Opportunity to grow in responsibility as the company scales



Application Instructions



To apply, send:



A short paragraph explaining why you are suited to screening creative talent



Your previous experience with hiring or application handling



Include the word “shepherd” in your message to confirm attention to detail



We are building a serious team. If you want to grow inside a structured agency environment, apply with intention.

title: SA Operations Lead + Project Coordination (UK Hours)
description:
We are a UK-based property investment and serviced accommodation (SA) management company. We operate seven serviced accommodation units and focus on delivering a consistent, high-standard guest experience through strong operational systems and quality control. Alongside SA operations, we run two to three active refurbishment/development projects at any given time, coordinating contractors, procurement, documentation, and stakeholder communication to deliver projects efficiently and to a high standard.



This is a hands-on Operations Lead role responsible for execution across our serviced accommodation portfolio and coordination support across refurbishment/development projects. Your core focus is proactive quality control and consistent delivery: you’ll enforce standards through checklists and evidence, ensure guests have a smooth end-to-end experience, and reduce recurring issues by continuously improving SOPs. In parallel, you’ll support project coordination for refurbishments by running follow-ups with contractors and suppliers, managing documentation, and scheduling appointments to keep workstreams moving without drift.



We’re hiring an Operations Lead who can run a cadence, enforce quality standards, and coordinate delivery across both serviced accommodation and active refurb projects.



Monday- Sunday:10:00-18:00 ( with 1 hour break) UK time, Saturday or Sunday off for one day.

Salary :700 USD Per month+ KPI bonus



Core responsibilities

Serviced Accommodation operations (delivery + standards)

- Enforce unit standards using checklists, photo evidence, and “definition of done” quality bars.

- Manage guest communications: fast responses, professional tone, calm resolution, and proactive updates.

- Maintain an issues/defects log and ensure issues are fully closed with root-cause prevention (not just “ticket closed”).

- Coordinate cleaners and operational VAs: confirm turnovers, verify quality, and drive consistent performance.

- Monitor pricing and availability: check pricing rules are being applied, flag risks/opportunities, and escalate recommendations.

- Create and update listings: listing setup, copy accuracy, amenities, house rules, photo requirements, and platform compliance (
 as applicable).

- Maintain and improve SOPs: update processes based on recurring issues, guest feedback, and operational learnings.

Property project coordination (admin execution)

- Maintain a project tracker for tasks, owners, due dates, and blockers.

- Source and compare quotes: produce a quote comparison table and recommendation.

- Follow-up with contractors, suppliers, utilities, council, other professional, keep reference numbers, paper trail, and next-step ownership.

- Documentation: build/format/update project packs, submissions, and version control.

- Appointment scheduling: inspections, contractor visits, deliveries, surveys, and access coordination.

Reporting directly to company CEO



Tools and working style

- We use Lark for communication, tracking, and internal workflows.

- Google Drive for document storage and document control.

- PMS/pricing tools as applicable (Hostaway/PriceLabs or similar).



Must-have experience

- Evidence-based quality control: Create and used checklists/audits/photo evidence used to enforce standards and reduce recurring issues.

- Serviced accommodation or hospitality ops: guest comms + turnover coordination + issue resolution.

- Property management working experience

- Vendor/contractor coordination: proactive follow-up, scheduling, and timeline control.

- Strong written English: crisp guest messaging and concise leadership updates.

- SOP ownership: has maintained/improved SOPs based on operational reality, not just followed them.

Nice-to-have experience

- Listing creation and optimization (
).

- Pricing/availability monitoring and familiarity with revenue management tools (e.g., PriceLabs).

- Property management operations or refurb coordination admin.

Personality traits we’re looking for

- Conscientious and detail-accurate.

- Proactive follow-up and ownership mindset.

- Structured and process-driven (lives in checklists/trackers).

- Calm, professional, and solution-oriented with guests and vendors.

- Improves systems continuously rather than firefighting repeatedly.

- Well organised with multiple task and able to prioritise



Hiring process:

Step 1: Answer the Google link below (required) and follow the instructions after.

Step 2: Answer scenario based questions

Step 3: Join 20-minute screening call

Step 4: Paid trial task

Step 5: Final interview + references



HOW TO APPLY:



Click the link

I’ll be in touch with you in 3-5 working days.



Please note, we ONLY accept applications through this application process. PLEASE DO NOT use the website’s message board as we don’t monitor this.

title: Video Editor / Motion Graphic Designer (Virtual)
description:
We’re SPX — a fast-moving company that helps TikTok creators monetize and grow their streaming presence. We’re looking for a multi-talented Graphic / Motion Graphic / Video Editor (Virtual) who can thrive in the fast-paced world of social media and content creation. Excellent spoken and written English is required.



About the role



This is a hands-on creative role that blends animation, graphic design, and professional video editing with social-media strategy. You’ll produce high-impact content optimized for TikTok and other social platforms, work quickly without sacrificing quality, and help scale creators’ online presence.



Key responsibilities



Produce eye-catching animations and motion graphics

Edit and optimize short-form and long-form videos for social platforms (TikTok, Instagram, YouTube shorts, etc.)

Manage and create content across multiple social accounts

Design branded marketing assets and promotional materials

Support TikTok-specific creative execution and trend-driven content

Deliver fast turnarounds while maintaining high production standards



Required skills & experience



Strong animation skills (2D/3D or equivalent)

Advanced graphic design capabilities

Professional-level video editing experience and portfolio

Deep understanding of TikTok trends, formats, and best practices

Ability to work quickly and independently with excellent attention to detail





Technical requirements(Preffered)



Proficiency with Adobe Creative Suite (Premiere, After Effects, Photoshop, Illustrator) or equivalent tools

Experience with video editing software and animation tools

Familiarity with social media management and analytics tools







Ideal candidate



Has a strong portfolio showing diverse creative work (animation, motion graphics, social videos)

Understands content that performs well on TikTok and similar platforms

Has experience working with content creators or livestreaming environments



Growth opportunity



Join a growing team in the creator economy with opportunities for creative ownership, professional development, and lasting collaboration with top creators.



How to apply

Please submit:

Portfolio (required)

Resume / CV

Examples of TikTok or short-form content you’ve created







Thank you — we look forward to reviewing your work and selecting the best candidates soon.



— SPX

title: AI Content Editor
description:
We build AI-powered content systems that print money for our clients. 

Now we need someone sharp to run them.



The Role

You'll use our proven AI workflows to generate high-quality content at scale. We hand you the systems, the prompts, the training — you bring the focus, the speed, and the obsession with getting every detail right.

This is not a "figure it out yourself" gig. You'll be fully onboarded into our processes and producing real output from day one.

Trial & Compensation



1-week paid trial — 2 to 4 hours/day

If you deliver, we scale you to 4+ hours/day

Starting rate: $2/hr ? up to $3/hr based on performance and consistency



We promote fast. If you're good, you'll feel it in your paycheck.

You'll Thrive Here If You:



Actually enjoy working with AI — not because it's trendy, but because you can't stop experimenting with it

Obsess over output quality and hate delivering anything that's "good enough"

Think independently — when something breaks or looks off, you fix it before anyone asks

Show up consistently, focused, and ready to work — not half-asleep scrolling your phone



Do NOT Apply If:



You quit when things get hard or boring

You need to be micromanaged to stay on task

You do the bare minimum and call it done

You can't commit to showing up sharp and focused every single day



We mean this. We've built a tight team of people who actually give a shit. One low-effort hire wastes everyone's time — yours included.

What You're Walking Into

A fast-moving, AI-driven operation where you'll learn more in one month than most people learn in a year. We invest heavily in people who invest in themselves. If you want to grow inside a real business and not just collect a paycheck, this is your shot.

? Apply now. Show us you're not like everyone else.

title: Account Executive / Demo Presenter (SaaS)
description:
## About the Role



We are a SaaS platform that helps independent live event venues improve profitability, financial visibility, and operational decision-making. We are hiring an Account Executive to run product demos, speak with qualified prospects, and convert demos into paying customers.



All demo meetings will be pre-qualified and scheduled for you. Your role is to run the demo, answer questions, and guide the prospect to become a customer.



This is a potential long-term role with significant growth opportunity as demo volume increases.



---



## Your Responsibilities



You will be responsible for:



* Running live product demos via Zoom or Google Meet

* Clearly explaining the platform and its value

* Answering questions from venue operators and decision-makers

* Following up with prospects after demos

* Moving qualified prospects toward signup

* Tracking demo outcomes and follow-ups

* Representing the company professionally during all interactions



You will NOT be responsible for cold outreach or lead generation. All demos will be booked for you.



---



## Target Customers



You will be speaking with:



* Owners

* General Managers

* Venue Directors

* Operations Directors



These are decision-makers at independent live event venues.



---



## Requirements



Required:



* Strong spoken and written English

* Experience running demos, sales calls, or client calls

* Experience explaining software or services to clients

* Professional communication skills

* Reliable internet and quiet work environment

* Ability to build trust and guide conversations confidently



Preferred:



* SaaS sales experience

* Account Executive or closer experience

* Experience selling to business owners or operators

* Experience using Zoom, Google Meet, or similar tools



---



## Work Style Requirements



This role requires:



* Professional video presence

* Confidence speaking with decision-makers

* Ability to work independently

* Strong follow-up and organization



This is a client-facing role and requires professionalism.



---



## Growth Opportunity



This role will start part-time and increase in hours as demo volume grows.



Top performers will have opportunity for long-term and expanded roles.



---



## To Apply



Please include:



1. Your experience running demos or sales calls

2. Your experience with SaaS or software (if applicable)

3. Your hourly rate

4. The word **VENUE-SAAS** at the top of your application



Applications without the word VENUE-SAAS will not be considered.



---



## Compensation



* $6–$12 USD per hour (based on experience)

* Part-time: 5–15 hours per week to start

* Long-term role with growth opportunity

* Performance bonuses per closed client

* Opportunity to increase hours based on results

contact for homeowners and trade professionals, helping them understand products, shipping

deliver a smooth customer experience.



You’ll work across phone,
, and live chat, apply judgement in real-world situations, and

liaise internally to resolve issues. This role requires strong communication skills, organisation,

and the confidence to guide customers, not just respond to tickets.

You’ll play a key role in maintaining Bespoke Backyards’ high service standards.



If you do not have direct experience in customer service role and with the Shopify platform, please DO NOT APPLY for this position. 



Key responsibilities



Customer enquiries & sales support



* Manage all inbound customer enquiries via phone,
, and live chat

* Answer pre-sale product questions and provide clear, accurate information

* Assist homeowners and trade customers with project-related questions and

considerations

* Provide shipping guidance, including bulky items and metro vs regional delivery

* Convert inbound enquiries into orders 



Order & delivery coordination



* Place customer orders accurately in Shopify and internal systems

* Liaise with suppliers, warehouses, and carriers to confirm stock availability and delivery

timelines

* Track deliveries and proactively follow up on delays or issues

* Communicate updates clearly to customers



After-sales support



* Handle warranty claims, faults, returns, and replacements

* Arrange replacement parts and resolve issues efficiently

* Manage customer complaints calmly and professionally, escalating when required



Quality & judgement



* Apply judgement and common sense rather than relying solely on scripts

* Identify recurring issues and flag them for improvement

* Balance speed with accuracy to maintain a high-quality customer experience



Required skills & experience



* Strong written and spoken English

* Confidence handling phone calls and customer conversations

* Comfortable working across
, live chat, and phone

* Experience with Shopify

* Organised, detail-oriented, and reliable

* Ability to apply judgement and problem-solving in real situations

* Comfortable working remotely with minimal supervision



Working style & expectations



* Full-time, remote/offshore role

* Working hours: AEST/AEDT 8:30am–5:30pm (1 hour unpaid break) Monday-Friday

* Expected to follow existing SOPs, help improve them and create new SOP's

* Comfortable taking ownership of tasks and outcomes



How to apply



Please follow these directions to apply for this position. Any applications that do not follow these steps will not be considered.



1. The subject line of your response must be "I am a Customer Service Expert"

2. Write one paragraph of 3 lines or less in black font and tell me about yourself.

3. Write a second paragraph of 3 lines or less in green, bold font about why you would be a great fit for this role.

4. Include your resume or brief dot points outlining your relevant experience

5. Send your reply to

If you’re ready to jump in and start dialing by Day 2, this is your chance to make an immediate impact.



Why Evolve?

What You’ll Be Doing

title: Appointment Setter
description:
We are based in Melbourne Australia. We are looking for a highly disciplined and hardworking Appointment Setter to join our growing education consultancy team. This is a high-volume outbound calling role. We are expecting you to make at least 20 calls per hour. If you are not comfortable making large volume of calls daily, this role is not for you. We are not looking for “talent”. We are looking for hardworking, consistency, discipline, and commitment.



Your Role

• Call 160+ warm leads daily (8 hours shift)

• Follow structured call scripts

• Book at least 10 qualified appointments for Senior Consultants daily

• Maintain accurate call records

• Handle objections calmly and professionally

• Follow up consistently until contact is made



This is a performance-based role. Only committed individuals should apply.



We Are Looking For Someone Who:

• Speaks clear, neutral English (minimal accent)

• Has strong phone confidence

• Is mentally strong and not easily discouraged

• Is comfortable with repetitive work

• Is available full-time

• Wants long-term growth

If you are job-hopping or looking for temporary income, this role is not suitable.



What We Offer

• Stable long-term opportunity

• A minimum of 20 hours and maximum of 40 hours per week

• Salary reviews Every quarterly

• Growth opportunity into Consultant role (for top performers)

We never had payment delay issues. You will always be paid on time.



Application Process (Important)

Due to high application volume, we only review candidates who complete the following:

1. Record a 1-minute self-introduction video in English.

2. Record a 30-second cold call simulation using any pretend script



Send your video link together with your CV. Applications without video submission will NOT be reviewed.

title: Remote Office Manager
description:
The Opportunity

We are a fast-growing US home improvement company (egress windows, glass block, vinyl

windows) operating across three major markets in Ohio. We are looking for an experienced

office manager to become the backbone of our business systems.

This is not a virtual assistant position. This is a leadership role where you will own critical

business systems, manage a team of virtual teammates in the Philippines, and be directly

responsible for the accuracy and integrity of our entire operation. You will report directly to our

COO and have significant authority and autonomy.

We pay $10-$12/hour because we expect excellence. If you are looking for easy work, this is

not the role for you. If you want to be challenged, grow your skills, and have real impact on a

growing US company, keep reading.

What You Will Own

Master Data Integrity (Your #1 Priority)

Our central job tracking system is the heartbeat of our business. You will own it completely.

• Audit the master ledger daily. Every job status, every payment, every permit must be

accurate and current.

• Identify discrepancies before they become problems. Chase down missing information

relentlessly.

• If the data is wrong, it is your responsibility. No excuses. You find the error, you fix it, you

prevent it from happening again.

Team Management

• Manage a team of virtual teammates in the Philippines who handle production data

entry, process tasks, and customer service.

• Conduct daily check-ins and run tea
etings. Assign tasks. Review work quality. Hold

people accountable when work is incomplete or incorrect.

• You are not their friend. You are their manager. When someone misses a deadline or

makes repeated errors, you address it directly.

Collections Calls

When customers owe us money and standard follow-ups have not worked, you make the call.

• You must be comfortable having firm, professional conversations about money with

American homeowners.

• Some customers will be difficult. Some will make excuses. You stay calm, stay firm, and

get results.

• This is not optional. If you are uncomfortable asking for money, do not apply.

Permits & Scheduling

• Manage permit applications and follow-ups with US municipalities.



• Navigate tricky permit situations. Some cities are slow, some have unusual

requirements. You figure it out.

• Coordinate production scheduling to ensure jobs are completed efficiently.

Process Enforcement

• Audit job folders for completeness: photos, signed documents, permits, payment

confirmations.

• When something is missing, you hold the responsible party accountable. This includes

US-based field staff who may push back on you.

• You are the process police. Every step in our workflow must be completed correctly,

every time.

Your Growth Path

Months 1-2: Master the production data systems. Get the master ledger to 100?curacy.

Learn our permit processes. Establish authority with your team.

Months 2-4: Take full ownership of permits, scheduling, and collections. Develop and improve

our systems. Become the person everyone relies on for operational accuracy.

Months 4+: Take on management of our customer service team. Continue growing your scope

as the company grows. This role has significant upward potential for the right person.

Requirements (Non-Negotiable)

• Proven experience managing other remote tea
mbers. We will ask for specific

examples. If you have never managed people, this role is not for you.

• Excellent English communication (C2 level, native-like fluency). You will speak

directly with American customers, municipalities, and staff daily. Your English must be

flawless and confident.

• Assertive communication style. You must be comfortable pushing back, asking hard

questions, and holding people accountable. You will manage Americans who may

outrank you on paper. You cannot be timid.

• Obsessive attention to detail. You notice when numbers do not add up. You catch the

typo. You follow the thread until it is resolved. Mistakes frustrate you.

• High intelligence and problem-solving ability. You will encounter situations with no

clear playbook. You need to think critically, figure things out, and make good decisions

independently.

• Extreme ownership mentality. When something goes wrong in your area, you own it.

You do not make excuses. You do not blame others. You fix it and prevent it from

happening again.

Strongly Preferred

• Experience in US construction, home services, logistics, or operations administration

• Experience with collections or accounts receivable

• Familiarity with US municipal permit processes

• Experience managing data integrity in spreadsheets or CRM systems

Work Hours & Compensation

• Schedule: Full-time, approximately 7:00 AM to 4:00 PM Eastern Standard Time. You

will run tea
etings and coordinate with US-based staff throughout the day.

• Compensation: $10-$12/hour USD, based on experience and demonstrated capability.



• Growth: Compensation reviews as you take on expanded responsibilities.

Why This Role Matters

Our company is at a critical growth point. The accuracy of our data directly impacts our cash

flow, our customer satisfaction, and our ability to scale. You will not be a cog in a machine. You

will be a key leader helping us build systems that actually work. If you want a role where your

work has visible, immediate impact, this is it.

How to Apply

Send your resume and a written response (not a video) that addresses the following. Be specific

and give real examples:

1. Management experience: Describe a time you held a tea
mber accountable for

poor work or missed deadlines. What happened? How did you handle it? What was the

result?

2. Difficult conversation: Tell me about a time you had to have a hard conversation with

someone who did not want to hear what you had to say. How did you approach it?

3. Data and systems: Describe your experience managing data accuracy in a fast-paced

environment. What systems have you used? How did you ensure nothing fell through the

cracks?

4. Why this role: Why are you interested in this specific position? What about it appeals to

you?

Applications without thoughtful written responses will not be considered.

Do Not Apply If...

• You have never managed other people before

• You are uncomfortable with confrontation or holding people accountable

• You prefer to avoid phone calls, especially difficult ones

• You tend to let small errors slide rather than fixing them immediately

• You are looking for easy, repetitive work

If you made it this far and you meet these requirements, we want to hear from you.

title: Senior 3D Sculptor – Real Athlete Likeness (STL / CNC / Fabrication Ready)
description:
Overview

We are producing a premium Athlete Series of large-scale physical sculptures featuring real-world sports icons.



This is not a gaming or real-time asset role.



We are seeking a senior 3D sculptor experienced in creating hyper-realistic human likenesses for physical production (CNC, bronze casting, stainless steel, marble, etc.).



The primary challenge is exact facial identity replication.



This role is about anatomical precision and production-ready geometry.



Scope of Work



You will:

• Sculpt highly accurate 3D facial likenesses of real athletes

• Produce full-body or bust models suitable for fabrication

• Work from photographic references

• Capture bone structure, proportions, asymmetry, and identity

• Deliver clean STL/OBJ files ready for CNC, printing, or casting

• Ensure structural viability for physical scaling



This is fabrication-oriented digital sculpting — not concept art.



Required Experience

• Advanced sculpting in ZBrush (preferred), Blender, or Maya

• Demonstrated real-person likeness work

• Experience preparing STL files for CNC or 3D printing

• Knowledge of wall thickness, undercuts, and structural limitations

• Clean, watertight topology

• Understanding of how digital sculpts translate into metal or stone



This Role Is NOT For

• 3D gaming character artists

• Stylized or fantasy modelers

• Texture-dependent realism

• Realtime asset creators

• Dungeons & Dragons style portfolios



We are not building game characters.

We are building physical sculptures.



You Must Include

• Real human likeness examples (recognizable figures preferred)

• Side-by-side reference vs sculpt comparison

• Example STL or fabrication-ready mesh (if available)

• Confirmation of experience preparing models for physical production



Applications without real-person likeness examples will not be reviewed.



Paid Test

Shortlisted candidates may be asked to complete a paid likeness bust assignment with:

• Neutral clay renders

• No heavy texture reliance

• Fabrication-ready geometry

• Defined timeline



Deliverables

• High-resolution sculpt

• Clean, production-ready mesh

• STL / OBJ

• Neutral lighting renders

• Wireframe views



Budget

Quality-driven.

Compensation aligned with proven fabrication-ready experience.



If your work translates directly from ZBrush to CNC and into metal — we want to speak with you.

title: Sales Representative/ Account Manager
description:
NOTE: This is a direct hiring.

PLEASE APPLY HERE: 



Are you a relationship-driven professional who thrives on helping clients achieve measurable results? Do you take ownership of your work and consistently look for ways to deliver more value?



If so, this Account Manager role at 
 might be the perfect next step for you.



At 
, we build and augment sales teams for companies that want to scale. For this position, we’re supporting a client in the branded promotional products space — a trusted provider of high-quality merchandise solutions for businesses and events.



As a Sales Representative, you’ll use outbound calls and
s to build a pipeline of new clients. Additionally, you’ll consistently follow up on existing clients to encourage and secure reorders.



As an Account Manager, you’ll be the primary point of contact for assigned clients — ensuring seamless execution of campaigns, nurturing long-term relationships, and driving continued growth through exceptional service and strategic support.



Responsibilities

• Engage in consistent outbound activity — including dialing,
 outreach, prospecting, and follow-up — to build and maintain a strong pipeline.

• Conduct live, video-based sales calls and product presentations with professionalism and confidence.

• Manage and grow assigned client accounts by maintaining consistent outreach, understanding evolving needs, and recommending suitable product or campaign solutions.

• Collaborate with internal stakeholders and different departments to ensure smooth client and project execution.

• Track client activities, order statuses, and follow-ups using CRM tools and reports.

• Negotiate terms and agreements, closing deals that deliver exceptional client value.



Who We’re Looking For

• Experienced sales professional with solid closing experience, comfortable managing client relationships and ensuring their needs align with the right products.

• Proactive, organized, and relationship-focused.

• Strong outbound habits — comfortable dialing, prospecting, and consistently following up to generate opportunities.

• Target-oriented and motivated to hit — and exceed — monthly goals.

• Comfortable managing multiple client accounts and handling day-to-day communication.

• Strong listener who can identify client needs and align them with creative, strategic solutions.

• Thrives in a fast-paced environment with a mix of independent and collaborative work.

• Confident communicator with a service-first mindset and a drive to exceed expectations.



Skills and Qualifications

• Minimum 3–5 years of meaningful sales closing experience, ideally through live video calls.

• Demonstrated outbound experience, including dialing, prospecting, and follow-up cadence.

• Experience in account management, client success, or B2B relationship management.

• Prior experience with promotional products, marketing campaigns, or branded merchandise is highly preferred.

• Strong written and verbal English communication skills.

• Experience working remotely with US-based clients.

• Proficient in CRM platforms (HubSpot preferred) and project tracking tools.

• Detail-oriented, with excellent follow-up and organizational habits.



Compensation

Hourly Rate: $10–14 USD/hour based on experience.

Bonus Potential: Up to $1,000/month based on account retention, upsells, and client satisfaction metrics.

title: AEO & SEO Manager
description:
We are an 18 year boutique advertising agency focused on performance marketing and growth for impact driven brands. We work across multiple industries and manage several client accounts at once. 



Our culture is fast moving, accountable, and results driven.



We are hiring an AEO & SEO Manager with real AI SEO experience.



This role is responsible for increasing visibility across traditional search engines and AI driven platforms such as ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, and Bing Copilot. 



The goal is to increase qualified traffic and improve our likelihood of being cited, summarized, or referenced inside AI generated responses.



This is an agency role. You must be comfortable managing multiple projects and deadlines at the same time.



WHAT YOU WILL DO:



- Keyword research and search intent mapping

- On page optimization and content upgrades

- Technical SEO audits and implementation

- Schema and structured data strategy

- Internal linking systems

- Content optimization for AI citation and answer engines

- Monitoring AI visibility and brand mentions

- Managing multiple client accounts simultaneously

- Communicating clearly with internal tea
mbers

- Tracking traffic, rankings, and conversions



AI SEO EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:



- Experience optimizing content specifically for AI generated answers

- Understanding of how large language models source and prioritize information

- Experience implementing structured data to improve AI readability

- Experience creating content designed to earn citations

- Clear examples of measurable impact



WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR:



- 5+ years experience in SEO

- Experience working in an agency environment or managing multiple projects

- Strong organizational skills and ability to prioritize

- Experience with tools such as Ahrefs, SEMrush, Screaming Frog, Surfer, SearchAtlas or similar

- Ability to analyze Search Console and GA4 data

- Strong written communication skills



BONUS:



- Programmatic SEO experience

- Topical authority cluster building

- Technical SEO beyond basics

- Experience tracking AI citation visibility

- Automations



HOW SUCCESS IS MEASURED:



- Growth in organic traffic

- Improved rankings for priority terms

- Increase in AI citations or answer visibility

- Ability to manage multiple projects without missed deadlines

- Increase in qualified leads or sales from organic traffic for our clients



HOW TO APPLY:



Send a direct message with:



- Summary of your SEO experience

- Two specific examples of AI SEO work you have done



For each example include:



- The goal

- What you changed

- How you optimized for AI engines

- Measurable results

- Your experience managing multiple projects at once

- Tools you use weekly

- Availability and start date

- Rate expectations

- Location

- Computer setup and internet speed



Optional but encouraged:

Share screenshots or documentation that demonstrate AI visibility improvements.

title: Site Planner & Project Manager
description:
Job Summary:



We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Site Planner. This role is responsible for site planning, design, and layout to secure approvals for commercial, industrial, institutional, and residential (single-family and multi-family) projects. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of zoning regulations, AutoCAD, and project design to ensure optimal land use while meeting client requests and regulatory requirements.





Key Responsibilities:

* Develop detailed site plans, layouts, and designs in alignment with project goals and regulatory requirements.

* Site plan design includes the placement of parking, buildings, sidewalks, utilities, tree mitigation areas, residential lots, and water retention/detention areas.

* Coordinate with architects, engineers, contractors, and government agencies to facilitate project design and approvals.

* Ensure compliance with zoning regulations, with a specific focus on Palm Beach County Land Development (Zoning) Code and the technical manual.

* Prepare and present site drawings and design recommendations to clients.

* Optimize land use while considering environmental impact, safety, accessibility, and cost-effectiveness.

* Participate in project planning meetings and provide expert advice on site planning issues.

* Utilize GIS, CAD software, and other planning tools to create site plans and analyses.

* Develop and maintain strong working relationships with municipal staff to facilitate project approvals.





Qualifications:

* Bachelor's degree in Urban Planning, Civil Engineering, Architecture, Landscape Architecture, or a related field.

* Proven experience in site planning, land development, or a related discipline.

* Proficiency in AutoCAD (additional knowledge of GIS, SketchUp, or other relevant planning and design software is a plus).

* Strong knowledge of zoning laws, land use planning, environmental policies, and permitting processes, with familiarity in the site plan approval process.

* Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.

* Strong communication and interpersonal skills for working with multidisciplinary teams.

* Attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines effectively.

* Certification in planning or landscape architecture (e.g., PLA, AICP, LEED, or equivalent) is a plus.





To fast track your application, please submit the following information:

title: Landscape Architect
description:
Job Description: 

We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented Landscape Architect with at least 5 years of experience to join our design team. The ideal candidate will blend technical precision with creative flair, overseeing the development of comprehensive site plans that integrate complex hardscape features, aquatic elements, and regional horticulture.

This role requires a professional who is as comfortable navigating government zoning regulations as they are designing a custom fountain or selecting the perfect palette of Florida-native vegetation. You will be responsible for managing projects from initial concept through detailed construction documentation, ensuring every design is both beautiful and buildable.



Position Requirements:

* Degree in Landscape Architecture

* In-depth experience designing and preparing site plans and landscape/hardscape plans

* Ability to review and apply government regulations

* Knowledge and experience with hardscape and construction details

* Experience with hardscape materials, pools, and fountain design

* Knowledge of Florida vegetation and growing conditions

* Strong AutoCAD, Microsoft (Word and Excel) skills

* Working knowledge of graphic software programs (Adobe Photoshop, Sketchup, and PowerPoint)

* Ability to manage multiple priorities

* Portfolio of work samples

* Positive attitude and a strong work ethic.



* Minimum Experience: 

5 years 



* Minimum Education Level: 

Bachelor’s Degree 



* Required Major: 

Landscape Architecture 



Desired Qualifications: 

* Self-motivated

* Detail oriented

* Freehand illustration and rendering skills

* Good communication and verbal presentation skills





To fast track your application, please submit the following information:

Resume: A link to your Google Drive. Please ensure the sharing setting is set to "Anyone with the link."

title: Video Editor (B-Roll Focused – Talking Head Content)
description:
Rate: $1.25 – $1.50 per finished minute

(More consistent work available for strong performance.)

We’re looking for a skilled video editor who specializes in adding strong, relevant B-roll to talking-head content (finance/political style videos). This role focuses on clean editing and visual storytelling — no complex motion graphics or heavy effects required.

This is a long-term opportunity for the right editor.



Editing Style

For the reference video: 
 

We want you to observe:

How B-roll is placed





How it visually supports what the speaker is saying





How it enhances understanding without distracting





The overall edit does not need to be fast-paced. However, the B-roll placement should feel dynamic, intentional, and well-timed.



What We’re Looking For

Strong, relevant B-roll that directly supports the message





Good judgment in choosing visuals





No random or generic stock footage





Clear storytelling through visuals





The speaker should still appear on screen at times — this should not be pure B-roll throughout. However, B-roll should be prioritized so we can clearly evaluate your selection and storytelling skills.

title: WordPress Web Designer
description:
The Project

We are looking for a skilled WordPress Designer to lead a comprehensive redesign of an existing holiday farm website: 
.



The goal is to transform the current site into a modern, high-converting digital presence that attracts more guests and simplifies the booking/inquiry process.



Key Objectives

Design Refresh: Create a premium, welcoming, and modern aesthetic that reflects the charm of the holiday farm.



Conversion Focused: The layout must be optimized to generate more inquiries and leads quickly.



Mobile-First: The site must be 100% responsive and perform flawlessly on all mobile devices.



Ease of Use: You must use a popular WordPress Page Builder (e.g., Elementor, Divi, Bricks). The backend must be set up so the client can easily edit text, images, and prices themselves without needing to code.



Your Requirements

Proven Experience: You have a track record of successfully redesigning WordPress websites.



Portfolio: You can provide high-quality examples of previous WordPress sites you have built (please include links).



Strategic Thinking: You understand how design choices influence user behavior and lead generation.



Communication: You are available for an initial briefing call to discuss the project details.



The Process

Application: Submit your portfolio and a brief summary of your WordPress experience.



Initial Interview: We will hold a short call to show you the specific requirements and the scope of the new site.



The Quote: After the call, you will be asked to provide a fixed-price offer for the "ready-to-go" website.



How to Apply

Please send us your resume and, most importantly, links to at least 3-5 WordPress websites you have designed or redesigned.



Direct Quote Required:

Before applying, please visit and review the current website: 
. We require you to include a price range (from - to) in USD ($) directly in your application for the full redesign and "ready-to-go" delivery of this project.



Applications without a portfolio and a price range in USD will not be considered.

title: Google Sheets & Dashboard Expert
description:
This role manages the backend technical operations of the supply chain — ensuring that inventory, pricing, SKU data, workflows, and dashboards are clean, current, and actionable. The person in this position will be responsible for building and maintaining dynamic, multi-layered dashboards in Google Sheets, supporting operational decisions through data accuracy and structured reporting.



Responsibilities:



• Build, manage, and continuously optimize live dashboards in Google Sheets to monitor stock levels, inventory movements, purchasing trends, and data integrity.

• Design structured reporting templates and tools to ensure clarity, consistency, and actionable insights across the supply chain.

• Maintain and optimize the master product list in Google Sheets, including SKUs, supplier information, cost/pricing structures, and product lifecycle updates.

• Conduct regular audits and reconciliations between Google Sheets, CIN7, and other systems to ensure data accuracy and alignment.

• Track inventory movements across platforms, identify discrepancies, and perform corrective data audits.

• Provide purchasing, sales, and finance teams with accurate, dashboard-driven insights to support decision-making.

• Manage and improve ClickUp task workflows, templates, and project boards related to operations and supply chain reporting.

• Ensure that all project deadlines and dependencies are reflected accurately in ClickUp.

• Support the creation and continuous improvement of SOPs for dashboard reporting, inventory data management, and system integrations.





Qualifications:



• Minimum 2 years of experience in inventory/data operations or a supply chain analyst role.

• Advanced skills in Google Sheets, including QUERY, VLOOKUP, pivot tables, and error-checking.

• Experience with Looker Studio or similar data visualization tools.

• Proven experience in building and maintaining structured, multi-tab dashboards for operational and executive use.

• Strong understanding of inventory flow, product lifecycle stages, and cost/pricing structures.

• Highly analytical with exceptional attention to detail and accuracy in data handling.

• Skilled in data reconciliation and resolving discrepancies across multiple systems.

• Familiar with inventory management platforms such as CIN7, DEAR, or similar tools.

• Experienced in using ClickUp or equivalent tools for project tracking and workflow automation.

• Able to document and maintain standard operating procedures (SOPs) for dashboards and data processes.

• Self-motivated, reliable, and comfortable working in a fully remote, results-driven environment.

• Bonus: Experience working in e-commerce, hardware, or logistics-related industries.





Essential Requirements for Remote Work:

• Reliable Laptop or Desktop Computer.

• Stable and high-speed internet connection.

• Power source and backup internet connection in case of electricity interruptions.



***How to Apply***



Take the next step by completing our application form:


/
/f/3j1fc-35945/HQ578HNFWTW3B7LXDL



Note: Only successful candidates will be contacted for the next phase of the selection process. We appreciate your time and interest in joining our team.

title: Sales Channel Executive
description:
Working Hours: 9:00 AM to 7:00 PM HKT (Monday to Friday) including 1-hour lunch break and 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM HKT (Saturday)





We are looking for a fast, organized, and proactive Sales Channels Executive to help move aging inventory through non-traditional sales channels and direct B2B outreach. This role is not about managing an online shop — it's about using alternative platforms, tools, and communication methods to get inventory into the hands of the right buyers quickly. The role requires someone who can think creatively, act quickly, communicate clearly, and follow through with persistence.



This is a remote position, ideal for someone who is experienced in B2B sales support, platform-based listings, and high-speed communication across
 and phone.



Responsibilities

• Aging Inventory Movement: Take full ownership of promoting and moving aging inventory through alternative sales channels, B2B networks, and creative outreach.

• B2B Lead Generation & Outreach: Identify, contact, and follow up with potential B2B buyers via
 and phone to generate sales opportunities and partnerships.

• Platform Management: Post and maintain inventory on appropriate online platforms (e.g., classifieds, B2B directories, trade forums) to increase visibility and inbound inquiries.

• Rapid Response Communication: Act as the first point of contact for inbound and outbound communication — all
s and phone calls must be answered promptly, professionally, and with urgency.

• Follow-up Execution: Ensure every lead or inquiry is followed up quickly and thoroughly, keeping 
ntum until a clear outcome is reached.

• Tracking & Coordination: Maintain accurate logs of communication, inventory postings, outreach status, and buyer pipelines in shared trackers or CRM tools.

• Cross-Team Collaboration: Coordinate with internal sales and operations teams to ensure availability, pricing, and delivery readiness are aligned with sales efforts.



Requirements

• Experience in B2B sales, inventory coordination, or sales support — especially in managing unsold or aging stock.

• Excellent communication skills — written and verbal — with a focus on speed, clarity, and persuasiveness.

• Confident making and receiving phone calls; professional tone and persistence are key.

• Strong follow-up discipline — nothing gets missed or delayed.

• Highly organized, proactive, and able to juggle multiple outreach activities simultaneously.

• Comfortable working remotely and independently, with strong self-management.

• Familiarity with tools like Google Workspace, Excel/Sheets, CRM software, WhatsApp Business, and online classified/trade platforms.

• A background in automotive, electronics, machinery, or hardware sales is a plus, but not required.





Essential Requirements for Remote Work:

• Reliable Laptop or Desktop Computer.

• Stable and high-speed internet connection.

• Power source and backup internet connection in case of electricity interruptions.





***How to Apply***



Take the next step by completing our application form:


/
/f/3j1fc-35945/HQ578HNFWTW3B7LXDL



Note: Only successful candidates will be contacted for the next phase of the selection process. We appreciate your time and interest in joining our team.

title: Junior Multimedia Designer
description:
Working Hours: 9:00 AM to 7:00 PM HKT (Monday to Friday), including 1-hour lunch break, and 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM HKT (Saturday)



JOB SUMMARY



We are seeking a talented multimedia designer to join our graphic design team. As a multimedia designer, you will be working closely with our in-house graphic designers and software programmers to design and produce high-end visual, textual, and animated content for our website.



To ensure success, you should have a background in digital design, excellent communication skills, and the ability to collaborate on projects. Ultimately, a top-notch multimedia designer is someone whose visual design skills translate into high-quality animated content that engages website viewers.



RESPONSIBILITIES

• Meeting with stakeholders to determine the project scope.

• Researching media techniques and design ideas.

• Developing multimedia content ideas in collaboration with graphic designers, visual designers, and software programmers.

• Designing and producing attractive multimedia content according to website specifications.

• Creating video assets for digital marketing campaigns.

• Creating digital images, video animations, and textual animations.

• Creating original artwork for digital image processing.

• Creating animated sequences using computer animation software.

• Recording, editing, and encoding audio files.

• Performing media edits based on user feedback.



QUALIFICATIONS & SKILLS

• Minimum of two (2) years experience as a Multimedia Designer.

• Fluent English communication skills.

• Bachelor's degree in graphic design, digital design, film, or a related field.

• A complete portfolio of multimedia design content showcasing your skills and experience.

• In-depth knowledge of software design programs such as Adobe Creative Suite, and Figma.

• Ability to collaborate on long-term projects.

• Excellent knowledge of storyboarding, visual design principles, and animation.

• Artistic with a keen eye for aesthetics and visually appealing content.

• Good communication and interpersonal skills.

• Basic knowledge of web publishing software.

• A passion for motorcycles is preferred but not required.

• Basic knowledge of website builders such as Webflow, WordPress, or Shopify.

• Capable to work in a fast-paced environment.



Essential Requirements for Remote Work:

• Reliable Laptop or Desktop Computer.

• Stable and high-speed internet connection.

title: Junior Virtual Assistant / Business Operations Assistant
description:
*** Please read through the entire post before applying.  Thanks! ***



Company Description

Engage Video Production (EVP) creates educational and communication focused video content, primarily for aerospace, defense, and technical clients. Our work helps high stakes organizations explain complex ideas clearly, train teams effectively, and communicate with absolute precision. We operate with a military grade standard of excellence and are looking for a Junior Business Operations Assistant who is ready to grow within a high accountability environment.



The Three Pillars of Success at EVP

To succeed here, you must embody these three core values:



Discipline: You follow through on every task without "floundering" or ghosting. You possess the self-discipline to manage your time and meet deadlines without constant supervision.



Motivation and Dedication: You are dedicated to the mission and the company's growth. You don't just "do a job"; you look for ways to contribute to the overall success of the team.



Radical Integrity and Accountability: You own your mistakes immediately. You have the backbone to point out errors for correction, even if they are your own, because you understand that precision is non-negotiable.



*** Role Overview *** 

This is a "Junior Plus" role designed for someone who is not completely green but is looking to move toward a high level lead position. We invest in people who show discipline, but we have zero tolerance for lack of communication.



*** Core Responsibilities *** 

Data Management: Update and maintain Google Sheets with project tracking data.



Social Media Support: Basic scheduling and engagement via Meta Business Suite and LinkedIn.



Communication: Drafting clear, concise internal updates and client
s.



Administrative Support: Organizing digital files and ensuring project folders meet our strict naming conventions.



*** Must-Have Technical Skills*** 

Google Workspace: High proficiency in Google Sheets (data entry and basic formulas) and
 communications.



Meta Business Suite: Experience scheduling posts and monitoring basic analytics (LinkedIn,
, Instagram).



English Fluency: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.



*** Compensation ***

Starting at: $250 (~14,500 PHP) to $350 (~20,000 PHP) USD per month (Based on 20 hours/week, subject to change). [*Conversions are approximate.]



Rate Determination: Starting salary within the ranges above is dependent upon experience and skill.



Schedule: Flexible, but requires a 2 hour overlap with US Central Time (CST) for sync meetings.  There are also responsiveness requirements for urgent issues/communications. 



*** How to Apply *** 

To be considered, you must follow these steps exactly. Failure to do so will result in an immediate disqualification.



Change the Subject Line of your application to: "Precision Assistant – [Your Full Name]".



In the first paragraph, tell us in two sentences or less why you are interested in the aerospace and defense industry.



Confirm that you have a stable internet connection and a dedicated workspace.



Attach (or link to) your CV/resume in PDF format only.

title: Market Research Assistant (Remote, Ongoing)
description:
We are looking for a detail-oriented assistant to collect customer complaints from public reviews of premium skincare products.



Duration: 1-2 weeks, $ 5-6/hour, 15-20 hours



The task involves reading reviews and extracting exact customer frustrations.

You must not rewrite or summarize — accuracy matters more than speed.



This is ongoing work for the right person.

Shortlisted applicants will be invited to a small paid trial assignment before hiring.



What You’ll Do

Find public reviews of high-end skincare products

Copy exact complaint wording

Organize findings in a simple format



Screening Question

In 2–3 sentences, explain the difference between a customer complaint and a product description.

title: Telegram Marketing Manager
description:
Role summary



We manage multiple
 channels across the full funnel. We’re looking for a
 Marketing Manager who executes daily: posting, scheduling, time-sensitive updates, and performance iteration. This is not a “creative content” job — this is operator work with clear KPIs.



You’ll work closely with our copywriter and use existing assets (proof, results, testimonials) while adapting fast to new flows and campaigns.



What you will do (daily)



Create, schedule, and post
 content across multiple channels (every day)

Post time-sensitive updates (trades/updates go live, timing is critical)

Turn proof/assets into conversion-focused posts (wins, screenshots, testimonials, updates)

Run a weekly content plan + daily execution

Coordinate with the copywriter to keep voice, structure, and campaign alignment

Track performance and improve posts based on data

KPIs you will be measured on



CTR (primary)

Views / reach per post

Channel growth

Upsells influenced (indirect contribution)

Consistency + speed (no missed posting windows)



Requirements (must-have)



Proven experience managing
 channels with a daily posting cadence

Strong English writing (short, punchy, persuasive)

Fast execution: you can deliver volume without losing quality

Strong understanding of timing, hooks, social proof, urgency, and clear CTAs

Highly reliable: 7-day consistency is non-negotiable

Proven knowledge of forex trading and trading psychology (you understand core concepts and can translate them into simple, engaging
 content)



Nice-to-have (big advantage)



Strong copywriting skills (if you can write high-converting
 posts, you have a clear edge)

Proactive mindset: you don’t wait for instructions, you spot what’s needed and execute fast

Comfortable working with performance metrics (CTR, views, growth) and iterating quickly



How to apply (mandatory)



Reply with:

Your
/community experience (what channels, what results)

6 sample posts (English, max 3–5 lines each):

- time-sensitive update (new trades live)

- social proof post that asks for results (non-pushy)

- engagement post (question/poll style)

- value/education post (short)

- 
ntum post (FOMO without hype spam)

- retention post (keep people active)

- 3-line explanation 
 style): risk management + trading psychology

- A proven cv with Prior work experience

title: Amazon Fee & Unit Economics Management Accountant
description:
Urgent Hiring: Amazon Fee & Unit Economics Management Accountant

Reports To:  CEO

Work Hours:  Philippines daytime work hours



ONLY APPLICANTS WHO WILL APPLY THROUGH THE LINK WILL BE ENTERTAINED.



Company Vision:

We want to work with you to grow our company while helping you to become a superstar in your field.  We value problem solvers, go getters, people with opinions who want to make an impact.  You will be on the leading edge of Amazon and online strategies and will be continually improving your knowledge in the pursuit of helping us grow our business.  

At the same time, you will be working with a company that values community & family in both our internal and customer facing sides.  Our mission is to delight kids & parents with creative craft kits and related products.  We are 100% focused on that mission and want you to be there on the ride with us!

That’s where you come in as our next Amazon Fee & Unit Economics Management Accountant



Role Purpose

Own, track, and optimize every cost that impacts Amazon unit economics, so leadership always has a clear, accurate, and optimized view of true ASIN-level profitability.



What Success Looks Like:

Success in this role means true Amazon profitability is no longer a guessing game. Every ASIN has a fully loaded cost that includes product cost, shipping, duties, Amazon fees, affiliate commissions, and ranking-related marketing spend. Leadership can confidently d
 which products to scale, reprice, suppress, liquidate, or discontinue based on real data — not blended averages or assumptions.



A top performer in this role consistently reduces total Amazon unit costs while improving cost visibility. Through tight auditing, proactive fee recovery, smarter shipping and duty tracking, and disciplined attribution of affiliate and ranking spend, this role directly increases contribution margin without increasing ad spend or revenue risk.



Primary Objectives

•  Amazon Fee, Shipping & Cost Auditing

Own end-to-end auditing of all Amazon, logistics, and ranking-related costs.

•  Fully Loaded ASIN-Level Unit Economics

Maintain accurate per-unit costs including shipping, duties, fees, affiliates, and marketing.

•  Cost Optimization & Reduction

Identify and implement cost-saving opportunities across fees, logistics, and promotional spend.

•  Profitability & Decision Support

Provide leadership with clean, reliable Amazon cost and margin reporting.  



Regular Work Activities

•  Audit all Amazon FBA fees (pick/pack, weight, storage, returns)

•  Track short-term and long-term storage fees by ASIN

•  Monitor aged inventory fees and cost exposure

•  Track AWD inbound, storage, and handling fees

•  Reconcile inbound placement fees

•  Track removal, disposal, and liquidation costs

•  Track international shipping costs (factory ? port ? Amazon)

•  Allocate shipping cost per unit by shipment and ASIN

•  Track duties, tariffs, customs, and brokerage fees

•  Maintain landed cost per unit calculations

•  Track affiliate commissions tied to Amazon sales

•  Attribute affiliate spend at ASIN or product-group level

•  Track ranking, launch, and promotional marketing costs

•  Identify unprofitable or fee-heavy SKUs

•  Submit and track Amazon reimbursement claims

•  Create monthly Amazon cost & margin reports

•  Monitor fee and cost trend anomalies

•  Maintain SOPs for Amazon cost tracking and audits



Key Skills Required

•  Understanding & ability to learn Amazon FBA fee structures

•  Strong grasp of landed cost accounting

•  Advanced spreadsheet skills

•  Experience with SKU-level profitability modeling

•  Strong analytical and investigative mindset

•  High attention to detail

•  Ability to reconcile complex datasets

•  Process-driven 

•  Cost-reduction oriented thinking

•  Clear written & verbal communication



People Contacts and Interactions – What are the primary people contacts in this job (who, why, and how often)?

•  Direct report to the CEO

•  Frequent communication with

• Operations Team

• Logistics Team



Role Requirements

Experience, Training, and Education 

•  2+ years working with Amazon Seller Central data

•  Experience tracking shipping, duties, and landed costs

•  Familiarity with FBA, AWD, and storage fee structures

•  Advanced spreadsheet proficiency required

•  E-commerce or marketplace finance experience preferred

•  Experience submitting Amazon reimbursement claims preferred

•  Comfortable owning ASIN-level economics end-to-end

•  Strong personal accountability

•  Not responsible for tax, payroll, AR/AP, or general bookkeeping     



How to Apply:

Click the link - 

ONLY APPLICANTS WHO WILL APPLY THROUGH THE LINK WILL BE ENTERTAINED.

• Submit and track Amazon reimbursement claims

Key Skills Required

• Understanding & ability to learn Amazon FBA fee structures

• Advanced spreadsheet skills

• Experience with SKU-level profitability modeling

People Contacts and Interactions – What are the primary people contacts in this job (who, why, and how often)?

Role Requirements

Experience, Training, and Education
