title: eCommerce Product Page & Checkout Developer (Replo preferred
description:
We are a performance marketing agency working primarily with supplement brands.



Our focus is simple: increase subscription revenue.



That means product pages, advertorials and checkouts need to convert cold paid traffic into long-term subscribers.



We work across different platforms depending on the client. Shopify is common, but not required. You must be comfortable adapting to whatever stack the client is using.



We often clone, duplicate and improve existing PDPs. We typically use Replo for this, but flexibility is important.



What You’ll Be Doing



• Cloning and rebuilding product pages

• Improving PDP structure based on CRO feedback

• Implementing subscription-first layouts

• Improving checkout UX

• Increasing AOV through bundles and offer structure

• Building advertorial to PDP journeys

• Making fast iteration updates based on our suggestions



We will send structured improvement suggestions. You will implement them quickly and accurately.



Tools We Commonly Use



• Replo (preferred)

• GemPages

• Native theme builders

• Subscription apps (Recharge, Skio, Appstle etc.)

• Whatever platform the client uses



What We’re Looking For

• Fast turnaround

title: We're Hiring: Reddit Marketing Expert — xTrades
description:
About Us



xTrades is a social trading platform. We help people learn how to trade and copy the trades of experienced traders. We are looking for a Reddit marketing expert to drive hundreds of new leads to our platform every month.



The Role



You are a Reddit expert. You have spent years on the platform. You know how it works inside and out. You know the rules, the culture, the algorithms, and the unwritten codes that keep accounts alive. You know how to market at scale without getting flagged or banned.



We are not looking for someone who has dabbled in Reddit. We need someone who has made Reddit marketing their craft. If you cannot show a track record of real results, this role is not for you.



What You'll Do



You will build and manage Reddit accounts that look natural and carry real credibility. You will identify the best subreddits in the trading, investing, and personal finance space. You will create posts and comments that generate attention and drive leads to xTrades. You will do this at scale, producing hundreds of leads per month. You will stay within Reddit's rules and avoid bans, shadowbans, and flagged content. You will track your results and report on what is working.



What We're Looking For



You have multiple years of hands-on experience marketing on Reddit. You understand Reddit's spam filters, karma systems, account aging, and moderation patterns. You know how to warm up accounts and build trust in communities before promoting anything. You can write posts that feel native to Reddit and don't read like ads. You know how to scale outreach across many subreddits without triggering detection. You have generated real, measurable leads through Reddit in past roles or projects. You are strategic, patient, and detail-oriented.



You Must Be Able To Show Us



Past Reddit campaigns you have run and the results they produced. Your approach to account management and ban prevention. Examples of posts or comments that drove real engagement and leads. A clear explanation of how you would market xTrades on Reddit starting day one.



Nice to Have



Experience in the trading, crypto, or finance niche on Reddit. Knowledge of Reddit advertising tools alongside organic strategies. Familiarity with AI tools to improve workflow and content output.



How to Apply



Send us a message with a detailed intro about your Reddit marketing experience. Include specific results from past campaigns. Walk us through your strategy for generating hundreds of leads on Reddit without getting banned. If you cannot provide real examples, please do not apply.

title: Accounting Specialist with US Real Estate Experience
description:
EJF Real Estate is a well-established, rapidly growing residential real estate company in the District of Columbia is seeking to hire an experienced Accounting Specialist who is responsible, organized, detail oriented, and reliable to join our fun/hard working team. You must have excellent communication skills.



Job purpose:

The Accounting Specialist (AS) will work directly with the Director of Corporate Accounting (DCA) to maintain the accounts for numerous companies. The AS is responsible for downloading and posting all daily bank account transactions and properly coding the transactions. The AS will maintain all GL accounts and the chart of accounts. This position requires an extremely detail orientated person with significant knowledge of accounting, bookkeeping, and Quickbooks.



Duties & Responsibilities:

- Daily activities include maintaining bank feeds between various banks and their respective accounts in Quickbooks. Once downloaded, the AS will code transactions to the proper GL to ensure accurate accounting.

- The AS will be responsible for maintaining rules for transactions and other methods of creating efficiencies for posting a large batch of transactions each day.

- Weekly activities will include posting invoices, creating invoices, posting payments, and making deposits.

- Monthly activities include bank reconciliation, ledger tie outs, journal entry postings, inter-company billing, and performing other duties to close the books each month.

- Analyze financial results and post information into monthly reports for the Executive Team.

- Manage regular preparation of relevant management reports, including weekly, monthly, quarterly and year-end reports.

- Performs various journal entries, account reconciliations, and provides general ledger support.

- Helps in the preparation of the annual budget for multiple companies.

- Support the DCA in the administration and preparation of information for opening and closing bank accounts.

- Will be part of the Financial Team and work collaboratively with tea
mbers. Attend required weekly meeting and participate by setting goals and completing assigned tasks.

- Prepare written reports to accompany financial data.

- Must be able to analyze data, problems, and issues, formulate solutions, and execute the resolutions. The AS must have at least an intermediate understanding of accounting principles.

- Willing to learn new software.

- Performs other duties as assigned.



Qualification:

- Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Business Administration, Human Resources or related field required.

- 3-5 years of accounting/analyst experience is REQUIRED..

- Extensive knowledge of accounting principles.

- MUST be highly proficient in Excel.

- MUST be fluent in English and have excellent writing skills.



Preferred Education and Experience:

- Proficient at Microsoft Office Suite and specifically Excel.

- Proficient in Quickbooks.

- Must be well organized and a self-starter.

- Detail oriented, professional attitude, reliable.

- Possess strong organizational and time management skills.

- Strong problem-solving skills, accounting principles knowledge, documentation. skills, research and resolution skills, data analysis and multi-tasking skills.

- Ability to communicate effectively verbally and in writing.

- Ability to interact with employees and vendors in a professional manner.

- Ability to work independently and with a team in a fast-paced and high-volume environment with emphasis on accuracy and timeliness.



Working conditions:

- Full remote work (work anywhere).

- Work schedule is Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST) including the 30 minutes unpaid meal break.

- Acceptance of using time-tracking device installed in your computer while rendering service with EJF Real Estate Services.

description:
About Us

X-Brands builds and scales brands through smart design, marketing, and innovation. We work with multiple clients to create distinct brand identities, high-performing e-commerce assets, and compelling visual systems.

We’re growing fast and looking for a Creative Designer who can think strategically about branding, execute clean designs, and confidently use modern tools (including AI) to bring ideas to life.





What You’ll Do



Create and evolve brand identities for multiple clients (logos, color systems, typography, visual language).

Design websites and landing pages from a UI/UX and visual design perspective (layout, hierarchy, components, and flows — no coding or development required).

Design Amazon A+ content and storefronts that are visually strong and conversion-focused.

Develop creative assets for ads, social media, and marketing campaigns across different brands.

Use AI tools (ChatGPT, image generators, design assistants) to ideate, iterate, and accelerate creative output—while maintaining quality and originality.

Design packaging and product visuals that stand out both online and on shelves.

(Bonus) Support photo editing, retouching, or light motion/animation when needed.





What We’re Looking For

Strong Amazon design experience (A+ content, storefronts, e-commerce visuals).

Proven ability to create brand identities, not just individual assets.

Comfortable working across multiple brands and clients with different aesthetics.

Confident using AI/ChatGPT in your creative workflow and able to explain how you use it.

A strong portfolio showing branding, e-commerce, advertising, or packaging work.

Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, and other design tools you rely on.

Detail-oriented, fast, collaborative, and able to handle feedback well.

(Nice to have) Photo editing, motion design, or short-form video experience.





The Process



Submit your portfolio (required).

Shortlisted candidates will complete a short creative test:

Amazon design task

Brand/AI-assisted creative exercise





Why Join Us



Shape multiple brands from the ground up.

Work in an environment that values creative thinking and experimentation.

Use creativity + AI to produce work that actually performs.

See your designs make a real, measurable impact across brands.

title: Sales & Administrative Representative
description:
Job Title: Sales & Administrative Representative

Position type: Full-time

Work hours: 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM EST

Work days: Monday to Friday



Scope of Work/Responsibilities:



Sales Support

-Handle inbound inquiry calls and respond to leads from digital marketing funnels

-Make outbound calls to warm and cold leads to share information and book appointments

-Educate prospects about services, pricing, and clinical approach using a consultative tone

-Guide leads toward booking a low-cost initial consult and prepare them for next steps



Administrative Duties

-Schedule consultations and follow-up appointments using EHR and internal tools

-Coordinate with medical providers, clinical team, and support staff

-Process payments for consults, lab tests, and service packages

-Maintain accurate lead and patient records in CRM and EHR systems



Communication & Correspondence

-Act as a warm, compassionate point of contact via
, phone, and SMS

-Provide timely follow-ups and clear guidance to prospective and current patients

-Log all interactions and statuses to ensure smooth onboarding and funnel progression



Must-Have Qualifications

-Excellent spoken and written English with a warm, professional tone

-Strong critical thinking skills (handle objections, guide conversations strategically)

-Proficient with Microsoft Office, CRM tools (e.g., Hubspot, Zoho), and EHR systems

-Comfortable with inbound/outbound calling, including cold calls

-Strong admin experience: scheduling, payment processing, and task management



Highly Preferred

-Familiarity with Go High Level funnels, workflows, and pipeline automation

-Experience working with health and wellness businesses (integrative/functional medicine clinics)

-Prior knowledge of treatments like peptides, PRP, weight loss injectables, or TMS (training provided if not)





How to Apply?

-Send me a google drive link with your resume. make sure it's public so I can view/access it.
